name: Trendy Barcelona
description:
Why do thousands of young people flock to Barcelona from all over the world every year? What is the reason? Is it the sea, the people, the spirit of the place, the culture, the climate…? Well yes, all of those. Barcelona is a delightful urban cocktail that captivates everyone and is part of what makes living here so unique. But beyond that is the trendy spirit of the people of Barcelona…
Barcelona is active in art and design, but also in international business, education, fine cuisine and sports. Despite the financial crisis, Barcelona offers the chance to live and learn in a creative human environment.
Let me take you to some places where you can feel this urban pulse. Most of them are scattered around the city, mainly in the neighbourhoods of Gràcia, the Raval, Poble Sec and the Born.
